briefdescription.para: Returns the global topology atom number belonging to local atom index i.

detaileddescription.para: This function is intended for writing ASCII output and returns atom numbers starting at 1. When dd=NULL returns i+1.

briefdescription.para: Return a block struct for the charge groups of the whole system.
Store the global cg indices of the home cgs in state,.

detaileddescription.para: This means it can be reset, even after a new DD partitioning.

briefdescription.para: Sets the j-charge-group range for i-charge-group icg.
Returns the atom range in the local state for atoms involved in virtual sites.
Sets the atom range for atom in the local state for atoms received in constraints communication.
Communicate the coordinates to the neighboring cells and do pbc.
Sum the forces over the neighboring cells.

detaileddescription.para: When fshift!=NULL the shift forces are updated to obtain the correct virial from the single sum including f.

briefdescription.para: Communicate a real for each atom to the neighboring cells.
Sum the contributions to a real for each atom over the neighboring cells.

briefdescription.para: Add the wallcycle count to the DD counter.
Start the force flop count.
Stop the force flop count.
Return the PME/PP force load ratio, or -1 if nothing was measured.

detaileddescription.para: Should only be called on the DD master node.

briefdescription.para: Set up communication for averaging GPU wait times over ranks.

detaileddescription.para: When domains (PP MPI ranks) share a GPU, the individual GPU wait times are meaningless, as it depends on the order in which tasks on the same GPU finish. Therefore there wait times need to be averaged over the ranks sharing the same GPU. This function sets up the communication for that.

briefdescription.para: Sets up the relation between neighboring domains and zones.

briefdescription.para: Initialized the domain decomposition, chooses the DD grid and PME ranks, return the DD struct.
Change the DD non-bonded communication cut-off.

detaileddescription.para: This could fail when trying to increase the cut-off, then FALSE will be returned and the cut-off is not modified.

briefdescription.para: Limit DLB to preserve the option of returning to the current cut-off.

detaileddescription.para: Domain boundary changes due to the DD dynamic load balancing can limit the cut-off distance that can be set in change_dd_cutoff. This function sets/changes the DLB limit such that using the passed (pair-list) cut-off should still be possible after subsequently setting a shorter cut-off with change_dd_cutoff.

briefdescription.para: Set a lock such that with DLB=auto DLB cannot get turned on.
Clear a lock such that with DLB=auto DLB may get turned on later.

memberdef.name: dd_partition_system

briefdescription.para: Partition the system over the nodes.

detaileddescription.para: step is only used for printing error messages. If bMasterState==TRUE then state_global from the master node is used, else state_local is redistributed between the nodes. When f!=NULL, *f will be reallocated to the size of state_local.
